title: The 5 best robot mops of 2023
description: From budget-friendly options to high-end models, we've compiled a list of the best robot mops currently available. They offer features like smart navigation, multiple cleaning modes, and app control for a more efficient and convenient cleaning experience.

title: Microsoft Build 2023: How to watch and why you should
description: Microsoft's AI advancements have impressed many. We can expect to see a lot more of that at Build.

title: Montana's governor is going after Temu, WeChat, and Telegram, too
description: Governor Gianforte wants to ban a list of popular apps from other countries. But American apps pose plenty of risks, too.

title: Samsung decides to keep Google as its default device search engine after all
description: Google's Samsung deal is safe for now.

title: Apple restricts employee use of ChatGPT. Here's why
description: The tech-giant joins the growing list of companies banning ChatGPT. Are the security concerns justified?

title: The best Father's Day gifts for a coffee-loving dad
description: If your dad depends on his morning cuppa Joe, skip the Starbucks gift card this Father's Day and impress him with the latest coffee tech.

title: Don't get scammed by fake ChatGPT apps: Here's what to look out for
description: ChatGPT is a wildly popular AI chatbot and scammers are happy to try to take advantage of that -- and you.

title: China is ramping up efforts to drive AI development
description: Tagging artificial intelligence as an important focus for the country, the Chinese government plans to step up efforts in research and development, including the establishment of regional AI industrial hubs.

title: ChatGPT dropped a free app for iPhones. Does it live up to the hype?
description: All of your favorite ChatGPT features are now available in the palm of your hand. Here are our first impressions.

title: How to disable DuckDuckGo App Tracking Protection for a specific app on Android
description: If you've found DuckDuckGo's App Tracking Protection is causing problems for specific apps, there's an easy solution for that.

title: I wish I had this $350 Lenovo Chromebook when I was in college
description: Take everything you'd want in an everyday laptop and slap an affordable price tag on it. That's what Lenovo did.

title: Alibaba to spin off cloud unit, take two others to IPO
description: Chinese tech giant plans to carve out its cloud business within a year and push its logistics and retail units to public listings, as it looks to gain market agility.
